Title: New Jack City
Plot: After discovering Father Jack is suffering yet again(!) from "hairy hand syndrome," Ted is delighted to send Jack, by "doctor's orders," to St. Clabberts Old Folks Home (otherwise known as 'Jurassic Park'). Unfortunately, Jack's replacement happens to be one of the nastiest priests ever - Father Fintan Stack. Along with his disregard for the church, Stack has a rather irritating habit of playing jungle music loudly at 3 o'clock in the morning, and a plan is hatched to get Jack back to sort out S
GuestStars: Brendan Grace, Fred Ridgeway, Noel Slattery, Vass Anderson, Fidelma Mullen, Larry O'Brien, Declan Mulholland
